title: Let's revive the Golden Rule
description: Weeks from the Charter for Compassion launch, Karen Armstrong looks at religion's role in the 21st century: Will its dogmas divide us? Or will it unite us for common good? She reviews the catalysts that can drive the world's faiths to rediscover the Golden Rule.
author: Karen Armstrong
keywords: TED, talks, God, TED Prize, global issues, politics, religion, violence
